title: Gent-Wevelgem Key Takeaways: A Blueprint to Take Down Van der Poel?
content:
Breaking down how the key Tour of Flanders tune-up race was won and what we learned from Lidl-Trek's aggressive tactics against Mathieu van der Poel.

Read the full article at Gent-Wevelgem Key Takeaways: A Blueprint to Take Down Van der Poel? on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
